# init(url:)

**Initializer**

Creates a document interaction controller with the specified URL.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(url: URL)
```

## Parameters

- **url**: A URL that specifies the location of the desired document. This parameter is retained. It can be changed later by modifying the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDocumentInteractionController/url] property.

## Return Value

A new document interaction controller object.
